headline.name: Tacos With Spicy Tofu, Tomatoes and Chard

docs.snippet: In these tacos, tofu stands in for meat in a vegan picadillo, cooked in a modified salsa ranchera. I’ve never been one for meat “substitutes,” and I normally don’t advocate using tofu in anything other than Asian dishes. But I find this pr...

multimedia.credit: Andrew Scrivani for The New York Times
Andrew Scrivani for The New York Times

docs.lead_paragraph: In these tacos, tofu stands in for meat in a vegan picadillo, cooked in a modified salsa ranchera. I’ve never been one for meat “substitutes,” and I normally don’t advocate using tofu in anything other than Asian dishes. But I find this pretty irresistible, a sort of vegan picadillo. You can make it spicier by adding more chiles, milder by using less. The tofu is cooked in a modified salsa ranchera; being tofu, it absorbs the sweet and spicy flavors of the tomatoes and chiles. I used firm tofu and mashed it with the back of my spoon. Silken tofu is also a good choice, though then you will have something more akin to Mexican scrambled eggs.

headline.print_headline: Court: Transgender Man Can Keep Pursuing Divorce
headline.main: Court: Transgender Man Can Keep Pursuing Divorce

docs.snippet: A transgender man in Arizona who gave birth to three children after beginning to change from female to male can continue to pursue a divorce, a state appeals court said Wednesday in reversing a judge who refused to end the marriage....
docs.lead_paragraph: A transgender man in Arizona who gave birth to three children after beginning to change from female to male can continue to pursue a divorce, a state appeals court said Wednesday in reversing a judge who refused to end the marriage.

headline.print_headline: Final Pair Convicted in Aryan Brotherhood of Texas Case: Prosecutors
headline.main: Final Pair Convicted in Aryan Brotherhood of Texas Case: Prosecutors

docs.snippet: The final two defendants of 73 members and associates convicted in a six-year investigation into the Aryan Brotherhood of Texas have pleaded guilty to racketeering in federal courts, a federal prosecutor's office said on Wednesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The final two defendants of 73 members and associates convicted in a six-year investigation into the Aryan Brotherhood of Texas have pleaded guilty to racketeering in federal courts, a federal prosecutor's office said on Wednesday.

headline.print_headline: Federer Survives Pospisil Scare in Cincinnati
headline.main: Federer Survives Pospisil Scare in Cincinnati

docs.snippet: Roger Federer survived an opening-match fright by outlasting Canada's Vasek Pospisil 7-6(4) 5-7 6-2 on Wednesday to claim his 300th Masters Series win and reach the third round of the Western and Southern Open in Cincinnati....
docs.lead_paragraph: Roger Federer survived an opening-match fright by outlasting Canada's Vasek Pospisil 7-6(4) 5-7 6-2 on Wednesday to claim his 300th Masters Series win and reach the third round of the Western and Southern Open in Cincinnati.
